TopicTitle: Juno probe halfway to Jupiter, will pass Earth in October...

Articles.Content:
...at a distance of 347 miles.

Halfway there but only 347 miles away? It's because of the multiple orbit gravity assist flight path it's taking.

http://www.gizmag.com/juno-halfway/28664/
